pages.name: RabbitTank
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:build/items/rabbit_full_bottle)Rabbit Fullbottle$(/l) and $(l:build/items/tank_full_bottle)Tank Fullbottle$(/l)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Build
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:build/devices/build_driver)Build Driver$(/l)$(br2)Rabbit Fullbottle Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Jump Boost$(br2)Tank Fullbottle Effects:$(li)Punch$(li)Strength IV (with empty hand)$(li)Strength II (with weapon)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Build
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:build/devices/build_driver)Build Driver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch$(li)Strength IV (with empty hand)$(li)Strength II (with weapon)$(li)Speed II$(li)Resistance II$(li)Jump Boost III

pages.title: Kamen Rider Build
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:build/devices/build_driver)Build Driver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch$(li)Strength V$(li)Speed III$(li)Hunger II$(li)Resistance II$(li)Jump Boost III
